      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • inverse

        public static long inverse​(long e,
                           long m)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Find the multiplicative inverse of a long int, mod m
        Parameters:
        e - The number to find the multiplicative inverse of (modulo m).
        m - The m with which to find the multiplicative inverse with respect to.
        Returns:
        The inverse of e, mod m. Uses the extended Euclidean Algorithm. Returns -1 if DNE.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • modPower

        public static long modPower​(long b,
                            long p,
                            long m)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                            java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Raise a number, b, to a power, p, modulo m
        Parameters:
        b - The number to be raised to the power pow (modulo m).
        p - The power to raise num by (modulo m).
        m - The modulo to work in when performing this calculation.
        Returns:
        b^p mod m
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • show

        public static void show​(long[] cipher)
        Display an array of longs on stdout
        Parameters:
        cipher - cipher code to be displayed

      • randPrime

        public static long randPrime​(int m,
                             int n,
                             java.util.Random rand)
        Find a random prime number
        Parameters:
        m - lower range of prime
        n - uper range of prime
        rand - a random prime number
        Returns:
        A random prime in the range m..n, using rand to generate the number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception thrown if the range does not contain a prime number

      • relPrime

        public static long relPrime​(long n,
                            java.util.Random rand)
        Find a random number relatively prime to a given long int
        Parameters:
        n - first number
        rand - a random number that is relatively prime to n
        Returns:
        a random number relatively prime to n

      • toLong

        public static long toLong​(java.lang.String msg,
                          int p)
        Parameters:
        msg - the message we need the number from
        p - the position to create the int from
        Returns:
        the two digit number beginning at position p of msg as a long int.

        Convert a long to 2 chars
        Parameters:
        x -
        Returns:
        The string made up two numeric digits representing x
